properties.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 18 at 8:53AM PST until February 19 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible.

* WHERE...The south-central Oregon Coast including Reedsport,
North Bend, and Coos Bay. Lakeside is also included for
tonight into Wednesday morning.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning.
For the Freeze Watch, from this evening through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing temperatures are most likely to
occur in areas blocked from easterly winds, especially in low
spots such as bogs and hollows.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING
